text:
VideoAmp | Full-Stack Engineer | Santa Monica, CA | ONSITE | FULLTIME | https://www.videoamp.engineering

VideoAmp builds technology for cross-screen marketing. We recently raised $21.4M Series B (http://variety.com/2017/digital/news/videoamp-funding-mediao...) and are looking for a solid full-stack engineer to join our team. You will work with our Node.js APIs and our front-end platforms being built in Angular.js/React. Full-stackers will also crossÂ­-function with other teams on internal projects, and develop API integrations with our partner companies.

We are also looking for Golang and data engineers. You can find our job postings here: https://jobs.lever.co/videoamp.com?team=Engineering.

Let us know you heard about us from HN!
